evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: a number of laws serve as EPA’s foundation for protecting the environment and public health. As Congress passes new environmental laws, EPA is most typically the agency tasked with writing regulations necessary to implement them.
